article: Some people think only school children do not agree with their parents, however, it is not true.  _  is a problem for parents and children of all ages. If it's hard for you to communicate with your  _  , don't worry about it. Here is some advice for you to bridge the generation gap . Don't argue with your parents. Don't get to your parents when you are  _  . Your parents probably won't  _  your ideas if you are shouting at them. And you can't express yourself  _  if you are angry. Go someplace to cool off. Make sure you understand why you are unhappy. Then think about what you want to  _  to your parents. If you don't think you can speak to them at the moment,  _  writing a letter. Try to reach an agreement. Sometimes you and your parents  _  on something. You can keep your disagreement and try your best to  _  each other. Michael's mother didn't agree with him about buying a motorcycle. They  _  over it. But they finally came to an agreement. Michael bought the motorcycle, but only  _  it on certain days. Of course, your parents might refuse to agree on something. In these  _  , it is especially  _  to show love and respect to them. Showing respect will keep your relationship with your parents strong. Talk about your  _  . The values of your parents are probably different from those of your own. Tell your parents what you  _  about, and why. Understanding your values might help them see your purposes in life. A good relationship with your parents can make you a better and happier person. It is worth having a try!
